Package com.jogamp.opengl.util.av

Public Audio/Video Utility Package

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AudioSink  
    GLMediaPlayer
    GLMediaPlayer interface specifies a TextureSequence state machine using a multiplexed audio/video stream as it's source.
    GLMediaPlayer.GLMediaEventListener
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioSink.AudioDataFrame

    Specifies the linear audio PCM format.

    GLMediaPlayerFactory  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description

    See Lifecycle.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GLMediaPlayer.StreamException
    A StreamException encapsulates a caught exception in the decoder thread, a.k.a StreamWorker, see See StreamWorker Error Handling.
